name: Call of Elyndra
storyline: The story revolves around you becoming a part of the local community during a time when a war brews. You'll team up with 2 other adventurers, traverse varied lands, repel an invasion, and uncover the truth about the surrounding world. While you may not have what it takes from the get-go, you will grow alongside your companions and the community. You will also grow tomatoes, cucumbers, and such, for you will be given a plot of land to farm and support the people of Elyndra. This means that you can play the game any way you want - you can do both farming and adventuring or focus entirely on either of those!
summary:
CALL OF ELYNDRA, where farming meets adventure! Grow crops, battle monsters in real-time combat, upgrade your village and solve ancient quests across five epic realms.

Play as you want--cozy or action-driven. In Elyndra, farming meets fantasy!
